sentences.english: No matter what happens, you’re not likely to see shantytowns.
sentences.chinese: 不管发生什么，人们都不可能看到哀鸿遍野的景象了。

sentences.english: With such high stakes involved, it is no wonder that markets are on their toes.
sentences.chinese: 有这么多股本涉入其中，也难怪市场哀鸿遍野。
